title: The GiG (number one) [Thai Movie]
description:
Title: THE GIG (number one)
AKA: The Gig
Year: 2006
Directed: Theeratorn Siriphunvaraporn
Genre: Romance Comedy
Runtime: 97 mins
Country: Thailand
Language: Thai
Subtitles: None
Source...............: VCD
File Format..........: AVI
IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0944198/

Cast
Lead Actors:
Kittikhun Sumritpansuk... Yai
Primorata Dejudom... Ant
Supporting Actors:
Bromwut Hirunyatthiti... Tik
Apisada Kraukongka ... Lisa

Synopsis:
Who wants a GIG , raise their hands . 
Who wants to be a GIG , step right up!

Welcome to the world of a gang of five university studs that bring all the girls on campus to their kness, giddy with... uh... Love?

This teenage romantic-comedy evolves around the chaotic love lives of a bunch of university students with Yai , a third year Art Communications major, as the ringmaster. Yai and this gang of four buddies know as THE FOUR SAINTS, form the popular GIG CLUB , a society where students with loser love lives want to be back in the game . Here they introduced to a fresh new concept of how to be a

Gig (gig) n. 1. = more than a FRIEND , but less than your LOVER.

Drawn from his own expertise, Yai creates THE FOUR GOLDEN RULES of how-to-be a GIG :

1.Jealousy is a no-no but to worry and be concerned for their well being is acceptable

2.No sharing of GIGs among friends.

3. A GIG comes second to a girl/boyfriend who shall remain the #1 priority 

And the most important rule of all 

4. Don&#039;t fall in love with your GIG!

Things heat up when drama ignites between Yai and two girls, Ant and Lisa

The situation becomes sticky when Yai realizes that he&#039;s headed for a downfall because he has broken his most important rule of all... to not fall in love! Find out how Yai resolves his dilemma and feel the competitive edge of real dirty and low-down rivalry among a clique of girls who are ALL wanna-be GIG!
